violationsByInspectionidList.name: Fleming Elementary
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: The PERSON IN CHARGE shall demonstrate this knowledge by compliance with this Code, by being a certified FOOD protection manager who has shown proficiency of required information through passing a test that is part of an ACCREDITED PROGRAM, or by responding correctly to the inspector's questions as they relate to the specific FOOD operation. (Pf)
violationsByInspectionidList.correctionDescription: Knowledge is to be obtained through an approved training program.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Fleming Elementary
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: FOOD EMPLOYEES shall clean their hands in a HANDWASHING SINK or APPROVED automatic handwashing facility and may not clean their hands in a sink used for FOOD preparation or WAREWASHING, or in a service sink or a curbed cleaning facility used for the disposal of mop water and similar liquid waste. (Pf)
violationsByInspectionidList.correctionDescription: Hands shall be washed in handsink(s) only.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Fleming Elementary
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: EQUIPMENT shall be maintained in a state of repair and condition that meets the requirements of the code.

violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: Light of the proper intensity shall be provided as specified.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Fleming Elementary
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: EQUIPMENT shall be maintained in a state of repair and condition that meets the requirements of the code.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Fleming Elementary
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: Exhaust ventilation hood systems in FOOD preparation and WAREWASHING areas including components such as hoods, fans, guards, and ducting shall be designed to prevent grease or condensation from draining or dripping onto FOOD, EQUIPMENT, UTENSILS, LINENS, and SINGLE-SERVICE and SINGLE-USE ARTICLES.
